infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: GraceFlow needs access to read your blood glucose data from Apple Health to help your coach track your progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: GraceFlow needs access to save your blood glucose readings to Apple Health for a complete health record.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: GraceFlow needs access to your photo library so you can share health-related images like glucose meter readings, lab results, and meal photos with your coach.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: GraceFlow needs permission to save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: GraceFlow needs access to your camera so you can take photos of glucose readings, meals, and other health information to share with your coach.

plugins.photosPermission: GraceFlow needs access to your photos to share health data with your coach.
plugins.cameraPermission: GraceFlow needs camera access to capture health information.
